A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not a Star Wars movie and craps all over the franchise. The plot is terrible and this film is a mess. Beloved characters are miss handled\, humor is bad and movie is full of cheap movie tricks and gotcha moments. This is so bad I would not recommend people even see it. This is a huge disappointment for me. I give it .5 star for the visuals but movies need to be more than the effects. The future of Star Wars is in serious jeopardy. Disney should be ashamed.
